name: TrialsGuider
0:
”Alexa Open trials guider”
”search trials in Stillwater”
”search breast cancer trials in Stillwater”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trials guider
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Alexa is making life easier to find the right Cancer Clinical Trial in USA by simply asking to Trials Guider. To get started, select the "Enable Skill" button in the Alexa App and say, "Alexa, open Trials Guider".

This skill helps patients to find the right trial for them in USA by retrieving all the active Cancer Clinical Trials from the NCI (National Cancer Institute) database. Find more information about Cancer Clinical Trials API at https://www.cancer.gov/syndication/api.

When using this skill, you must need to search based on City or City, State or Cancer Type. Simply Say "Alexa, open Trials Guider" then welcome voice will suggest you how to use skill. You can say "Help" at any time to get more information.

“THIS TOOL DOES NOT PROVIDE MEDICAL ADVICE, AND IS FOR INFORMATIONAL AND EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY, AND IS NOT A SUBSTITUTE FOR PROFESSIONAL MEDICAL ADVICE, TREATMENT OR DIAGNOSIS. CALL YOUR DOCTOR TO RECEIVE MEDICAL ADVICE. IF YOU THINK YOU MAY HAVE A MEDICAL EMERGENCY, PLEASE DIAL 911.”

Please check www.trialsguider.com for more information.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
